Method Detail

handle

boolean handle(InputStream in,
               OutputStream out,
               HTTPServer.KeyValuesMap headers,
               HTTPServer.KeyValuesMap query,
               HTTPServer.CookieJar cookies)
               throws IOException
Handles the http request.

Parameters:
in - The incoming data after the header.
out - The output. Header needs to be written.
headers - The header properties
query - The query value
cookies - Any cookies that were sent.
Returns:
Return true if the server should keep running, false if it needs to shut down
Throws:
IOException

log

void log(Exception exception)
Logs exceptions

Parameters:
exception - The exception to log.

log

void log(int level,
         String message)
Logs messages.

Parameters:
level - 0 = vital to display 100 = trivial to display
message - The message to handle
